name: bustimeleft
0:
”Alexa, ask bus time left.”
”Bus time”
”Where is my bus?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bus time left
des: Data is pulled from a public open data server for FIXED location. You can NOT modify bus number and bus stop location. Please do not download this skill for yourself. I can not help with personalizing the app for you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
